Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city building code, in relation to requiring construction site safety trainings related to mental health and wellness, suicide risk and prevention, and alcohol and substance-misuse
Items.MatterName: Requiring construction site safety trainings related to mental health and wellness, suicide risk and prevention, and alcohol and substance-misuse.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to building inspections and reporting following complaints related to rats and conditions that attract rats
Items.MatterName: Building inspections and reporting following complaints related to rats and conditions that attract rats.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the City of New York, in relation to requiring the department of buildings and the department of small business services to provide education concerning the proper installation of awnings and accessory signs, and in relation to waiving penalties and fees related to such signs
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of buildings and the department of small business services to provide education concerning the proper installation of awnings and accessory signs, and in relation to waiving penalties and fees related to such signs.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation providing for annual adjustments to the rental and carrying charges for Mitchell-Lama developments based on increases in the Consumer Price Index.
Items.MatterName: Providing for annual adjustments to the rental and carrying charges for Mitchell-Lama developments based on increases in the Consumer Price Index.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation setting the minimum notice period for rent increases to 60 days for Mitchell-Lama rental and co-op residents
Items.MatterName: Setting the minimum notice period for rent increases to 60 days for Mitchell-Lama rental and co-op residents.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city building code, in relation to providing community boards and elected officials with notice of sidewalk shed permits
Items.MatterName: Providing community boards and elected officials with notice of sidewalk shed permits.
